title: Art Shows
name: Art Shows
description:
A Map by Wyliefisher

Galleries and other places where I have shown artwork.

properties.name: Art On Tap
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 219 Shelby Street, Suite 201 Santa Fe, NM 87501Had a table at this 2005 multi-artist event. Free local beer was included in admission price

properties.name: Benefest
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher219 Shelby Street, Suite 201 Santa Fe, NM 87501Part of a multi-artist fundraiser in 2005.

properties.name: Bobo Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 22 north lexington avenue asheville nc 28801Had one solo show in 2005. Two pieces hang there currently.

properties.name: FUSE
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher403 West Rosemary Street Chapel Hill, NC 27516Showed here in 2006.

properties.name: Gallery Zero
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 14th Street atlanta, GAGallery Zero throws \'art parties\' in different locations. i was part of one here in september 2005.

properties.name: Lexington Avenue Arts Festival
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 22 north lexington avenue asheville nc 28801Had a table set up with Alli Good (http://www.alligoodart.com) at this street festival.

properties.name: Push
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher22 north lexington avenue asheville nc 28801Had a show with Alli Good (http://www.alligoodart.com) here in 2005/2006.

properties.name: Red Dot Fine Art
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 219 Shelby Street, Suite 201 Santa Fe, NM 87501Part of a group show in 2005.

properties.name: Sky People Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Wyliefisher 22 north lexington avenue asheville nc 28801Had my first solo show in 2005. The gallery has since moved out.
